Communication Breakdown

About

Luiz Henrique Monticelli is a multimedia journalist living in Riverside (CA). He has many years of experience in politics and electoral campaigns, and more than a thousand published stories in newspapers, magazines and other prints. His main hobby is landscape photography and hiking with his wife Dani, who is a postdoc at University of California. Luiz Henrique is learning english as second language and is constantly improving his photography skills. He is available and excited for new experiences of work in United States.

Curriculum Vitae available Here.

Career

  • February 2015 to October 2017

    PRESS SECRETARY
    Department of Agriculpture and Fisheries. Government of Santa Catarina Estate (Brazil)
